授業目的: To explore Japan's history in the period from 1600 to 2000. The emphasis is on social, political, and cultural history. Based on textbook readings we will discuss history and historiography in general. Your active participation is required and will shape the actual course.
到達目標: The participants will have a grasp of the chronology of Japan's modern history.  They will be able to identify important events and their contexts. The participants should be able to locate new pieces of information and analyze an unknown source.
特記事項: 【合併】総合日本学習科目（歴史Ｂ）（CIEC）/Japanese History B（国際学部）
授業方法: Combination of lectures, short reports and classroom discussions. Discussions will be based on 1) questions we have to the text and 2) analyses and readings of sources to be contextualized.The course requires extensive reading every week. Classes are based on participants familiarizing themselves with the textbook's points.
